txt.en: The Wracking-hall can be found in the Circle of Death.\n\nYou have encountered a number of focused will-binders in the Wracking-hall. If you interrupt their rituals, the nameless creatures can not be bound into the service of Gothmog.
Approach and interrupt Morgul will-binders in the Wracking-hall ([placeholder]/4)

It seems the cultists who labour within the Wracking-hall must maintain a great deal of focus to enslave the wills of nameless creatures.\n\nIf you interrupt their rituals, the nameless creatures can not be bound into the service of Gothmog.
The will-binder's focus breaks and the nameless creature is released!
Approach and interrupt Morgul will-binders in the Wracking-hall
You are close enough to interrupt the will-binder
Through tremendous focus and force of will, the cultists of Minas Morgul have learned to subjugate the nameless creatures dwelling beneath Ephel DÃºath.
In their arrogance, the Morgul will-binders fell victim to the same creatures they sought to control.

The Wracking-hall can be found in the Circle of Death.\n\nYou have encountered a number of focused will-binders in the Wracking-hall. If you interrupt their rituals, the nameless creatures can not be bound into the service of Gothmog.
You have disrupted the efforts of the Morgul will-binders to enslave more of the nameless creatures in the Wracking-hall.
